title: Levelup, a common interface for Go database drivers
author: fiatjaf
content: readme.md levelup package implements few types interfaces be used the actual "down" libraries, will implement core functionality each database. of "down" libraries implementing "up" interface:goleveldownrocksdownlevelup-js similarity the node.js levelup is mere coincidence. things: the value some key is "" blank not found, notfound be returned.rangeopts treats zero values if didn't pass anything, limit: 0 is same no limit, start: "" is same no start etc. rangeopts start is inclusive, end is non-inclusive. keys values are []byte, you to strings, github.com/fiatjaf/levelup/stringlevelup.
